participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and nostalgic, enjoys connecting through music and dance.
participant_1.background: i also like old school hip hop. i take dance lessons once a week. i was born in the early 80 s. i love new kids on the block. my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite.

participant_2.name: Luna
participant_2.personality: Imaginative and whimsical, loves to explore her creativity.
participant_2.background: i live in the cloud. i'm a little girl. i like to make time stop. i'm very lonely. i have superpowers.
